about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an groundbreaking and fresh experience with Drag Racing 3D. Our game is the best drag racing simulator with a wide variety of tuning options. Build your own unique dream car and compete with players from all over the world.

BRAND NEW AND UNIQUE
We will show a unique and comprehensive approach to car tuning. Moreover, our team is always listening to feedback from players, and continuously improving the gameplay. Join our community and help create a dream game.


DEMONSTRATE YOUR SKILLS
Strive for excellence in various game modes including Racing, Time Racing, Tournaments, and Championships. Maintain your speed and leave your rivals in the dust as you conquer the competition.


STYLE ABOVE ALL ELSE
Design your one-of-a-kind car with endless tuning options, various body parts, and custom liveries. Increase your car collection by acquiring more vehicles.


LARGE CAR PARK
We offer a selection of more than 50 cars. Furthermore, our car list is continuously growing as we listen to community feedback and add new cars on player requests.


TEAMED UP WITH OTHER PLAYERS
Find friends and team up to take on challenges together and compete with other teams to prove your dominance.


THERE IS NO HONOR IN BEING POOR
We offer numerous opportunities for players to accumulate wealth.

  • Daily rewards: Show your commitment and dedication by collecting various rewards just by logging in.
  • Blitz & Sprint: After collecting your daily rewards, take on daily tasks to earn in-game currency and experience points.
  • Flea Market: If you're looking to showcase your skills and earn reputation, sign a personalized contract at the flea market. Complete tasks and assemble cars for the owner to gain recognition.
  • Market: Set your own prices as a seller and choose what to buy as a buyer in this free market environment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

name: Drag Racing 3D: Streets 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Quad core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The racing simulator created on game engine with a realistic physics and wide customization options. Create a unique car, installing new parts and tuning up car characteristics. Compete with other players in various tournaments on colorful race tracks. Prove that you are worthy to be a champion!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
